text: The Institute of Engineering and Technology Lucknow (IET) is a college in Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh, India. == History == The IET was started by the government of Uttar Pradesh in 1984, to teach people about technology and engineering. The school is paid for by the government. ==Other websites== * * Yahoo Group Category:1984 establishments in India Category:Colleges and universities in India
title: Institute of Engineering and Technology
